alert.note: Alert for Poweshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 3:55PM CDT until March 31 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Poweshiek County in central Iowa... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 355 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Malcom, or 6 miles north of Montezuma, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Funnel Cloud has been reported. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Brooklyn around 400 PM CDT. Holiday Lake around 405 PM CDT. Victor, Victor and Hartwick around 410 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 187 and 204. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Iowa.
